structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
HEALTH AND WELFARE IN CITIES OF THE FIRST CLASS AND IN COUNTIES CONTAINING SUCH CITIES

law.catch_line: Building commission to be appointed -- Ordinance -- Appropriation.
law.text: If there is no building commission, of the type contemplated by this section, in the city of the first class, the legislative body of the city may, by ordinance, request the mayor to appoint building commissioners. The ordinance shall define in general terms the work proposed to be done by the building commission and shall make an appropriation for the necessary expenses of the commission. If the mayor approves the ordinance, he shall thereupon make the appointments.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3037e-2.
